name: Rae
text: We have been using Limestone Veterinary Clinic for about four years now. The front staff are always friendly and answer any questions. Dr. Pitman is very nice and a wonderful Vet he really cares about you and your pet. They just got a new vet he is very friendly too! They board your pets if needed and everything is affordable! I have three fur babies that they help keep healthy. I would definitely recommend them if your looking for a vet to take care of your fur baby!

name: Anthony Green
text: The nurse was so nice and loving to my dog. Great vet and I will be going back.

name: Hannah Schrock
text: Dr. Pitman is great, however one of his employees is a  total hag. Pierette or whatever her name is, is a complete bully and shouldn’t be working with people, let alone animals. I’ve never met someone so unhappy with their life. Everyone else there is great though.

name: Tim McCormick
text: We loved the puppy plan, I can say even after getting our puppy fixed she still loves going back which in my experience is a great thing! Dixie loves Everyone there.

name: Joshua Southard
text: The employees are extremely friendly and helpful with your 🐕 and/or 🐱 they come outside and get your pet and take very serious about your🐕🐈.  EXTREMELY CHEAP AND do good work with them. They also board and kennel too. BACK BUILDING IS THE LIMESTONE ANIMAL SHELTER. They only charge $100 and they are spayed or neutered and get all the necessary shots to legally keep it in Athens City limits but not Limestone County. 🐱🐶 Plus the thrift store beside it will let you pick a collar and leash FREE!! Just for adopting an animal. I adopted the best behaved pit I've ever seen. I only had teach her 1 time to stay within certain parts of the land. Good 👍 place!

name: A Harris
text: Very unsettling that even though there is no longer even a mask mandate that we can not come inside to see facility or be with our fur babies. Very very uncomfortable. So unless you’re cool with sending your baby into a facility you’ve never seen with a doctor you’ve never met , I’d go to town and country. You’re allowed in with your pet the whole time and they charge less for everything! Not bashing this place , the unknown is just scary. Scary not being able to see what treatment your pet is getting and where .

name: Sandra Hart
text:
I just moved to Athens recently & my 12 yr. old cat needed to see a Vet immediately.
Dr. Pittman, Pierette & the rest of the staff couldn’t have been nicer. Very responsive & her care was excellent.

name: Andrea Brown
text: Dr. PITMAN did an exceptional job with my dog! Let me tell you,  my dog hates going to the vet but loves Dr. Pitman!

name: Jennifer Curley
text: Awful awful awful!!!! Our puppy might die because the doctor was set on the fact that our puppy had parvo or distemper. Our puppy had neither one. Even tested her twice for parvo and it was negative but insisted that's what it was. She was eat up with worms and when we took her to another vet they said that he should of gave her more than just one pill. Now she may possibly die from his mistake. So I would not recommend you take your pet there!

name: Justin Garries
text: I'd  wouldn't use this so called Vet ever! He treated my friend's dog horrible and was so disrespectful! Sent her dog home unstitched and then told her to take him To another vet to get stitches.

name: Sue Shirley
text: Very friendly staff and helpful and caring staff

name: Joe Butler
text: I have never been to this facility. This is just one more example of Google controlling public opinion.

name: Miranda Turner
text: We’ve taken our pets there for the last four years.  They are very professional.  When we had to have one of our cats put down, they were compassionate and gave us all the time we needed to say goodbye.  They made a hard time a little bit easier. Would definitely recommend

name: George Dugger
text: They are good with the little buddies.

name: jeremy barnes
text: Hard to get initial contact to make an appointment but was well worth it. Another line would be amazing.

name: Kevin Hamilton
text: Always treated pets as family price are high but quality & quick service. Also staff is wonderful.I have had 2 dogs treated here @ about 6 years.

name: Bobbi Jo Townsend
text: Great vet!

name: Audrey Vanzant
text:
FRIENDLY STAFF
They can help you
Give them a call

name: Jennifer Gatlin
text: Dr pitman and his stuff is always so nice and caring takes great care of our animals

name: Donald Watts
text: Great veterinary

name: Meredith Munyon
text: We love this place!  Dr. Pitman is a very kind and caring man and that is evident each time we go there.  The staff is over-the-top friendly and efficient.  No negatives to say at all.  Exactly how you and your pet like to be treated.  They're the best!

name: Rita Ingram
text: Treated LUCI the BEST! THANK YOU!!!👍

name: Amber Cameron
text: Kinda odd, they ask for the money to spay and neuter before they even schedule it.

name: Keiston Jones
text: let me just say. I have not been to this office before, they have not seen my dogs before. I called at 7am because my vet was not in yet and had an emergency situation with my French Bulldog. Meline (I believe her name is) at the front desk was very pleasant and told me to bring him in as soon as I could to be examined. From the moment I walked in I felt welcomed like I've been a client of theirs for years. They got me right back to the exam room and the assistant listen to my every concern I had. Once Dr. Pittman walked in he examined my pup and did not blow me off as some concerned dog mom. He is keeping my pup to monitor him and keeping a close eye on him. (even if this is something small) I love that he is taking precaution to this situation. When you have to leave your baby it is always heart wrenching especially at a place you never been before, but they made me feel like they "got this" he is in good hands and I'm confident that they will exceed my expectations. Great facility great team. Will continue to take my dogs here from here on out.

name: Marty Bruce
text: Great vet!!

name: Sarah Fain
text: I took my son's puppy dog to Limestone Veteranary clinic to get neutered. They charged top price, and our dog came home with Kennel Cough and coughed night and day for several days and is still accasionally coughing..I know he had to have contracted the cough at the vet because he isn't around any other dogs ever while at his house.

name: Annette Charles
text: They took extremely good care if my baby girl when she had surgery.

name: Mary Lewis
text: I love this veterinarian knows what he's doing and treated my puppy Gabby Chihuahua really good and done a great job on taking care of her. When she needed help right away thanks limestone veterinarian clinic from Mary Lewis

name: William Flood
text: My personal favorite, excellent service and friendly

name: William Rust
text:
Awesome-Friendly staff... Second time there-definitely going to be my 🐶 goto place...
She's a large breed and they welcomed her without hesitation....  Thanks

name: Angela aka Angi Martin
text: I love the friendly staff and anytime we are traveling home we have a familiar face if we are dealing with a furbaby not feeling well.

name: tiffany benefield
text: They are always super friendly and happy to see you. They treat your animals like they would their own. They absolutely adore all their animal patients.

name: gustavo Yque
text: My wife and I have been coming to this clinic for two years now and today was our last visit in preparation for a move out of state. Both doctors at this clinic have been nothing but amazing with our two girls (cats) and we hope to find vets as friendly and as attentive where we're going. Thank you for providing a great survase to our families little additions!

name: Beth Perry
text: They  misdiagnosed my elderly mother's dog she took him back 3 times over 700 bucks not doing any better took to new vet sat and dogs is doing good so they ripped her off 700 bucks and the poor dog was sick for all most 2 weeks

name: Summer Jerome
text: Helpful and friendly staff!

name: Emma Burroughs
text: Best place to get an emergency flea pill

name: Shelia Lewis
text: Very unprofessional....

name: Denise Davis
text: Love the staff and Dr here. They really took care of Toby and Luna. Recommend them to all my family and friends.

name: Sherron Groves
text: Dr Pittman is a wonderful vet

name: sweet southern home girl
text: Very nice people they take care of my pets as if they were their own

name: Robin Abbinante
text:
Dr. Pitman has spayed 2 of my cats and a Chihuahua. Incisions healed nicely. Friendly staff. Prices are reasonable. Once, they let me pay when I could. Another time they gave me a free prescription.
Dr. Pitman's bedside manner might be lacking a little but I believe he knows his stuff.

name: Tracey Powers
text: They are awesome ☺️

name: Lea Morash
text: Love this vet office, so friendly and awesome to my lil guy when it's time for boarding

name: jennifer terry
text: I take every star back, while the staff was wonderful during the horrible process of putting our beloved Mattie Lou to  sleep, at some point she was "mistagged"!!!  She was cremated and "disposed of " . My sweet girl went to the dump!!!   instead of coming home,  we are devastated, need to know who is responsible,  vet or crematorium

name: Jane Thorne
text: Had my cat spayed with the snyp program. Everything went well.

name: Andrea Percle-Navarre
text: Dr. Pittman missed 2 UTI's on one of my dogs within a year. He kept telling me her breed didn't have UTI's. She's a mutt! I got a second opinion  and they found it. Turns out she has crystals regularly and we had to change her food to get rid of the crystals.  While I  love Dr. Pittman, he won't see my dogs for anything outside of their annuals.

name: David Perkins (Cascen)
text: Entire staff is very friendly and inviting. They know all the clients and animals personally. Take care of you like family!

name: Homo Moto
text: They treat our Westies really well. Very professional doctors and staff. This place is spotless.

name: Mary Lewis
text: Friendly people a good doctor and clean environment and knew what he was doing nice to my pet. From Mary lewis

name: April Smith
text: Love the people there. They are always nice to my self and my fur babies.

name: Andrew Hammond
text: The best vet's office in town !!

name: Jeanie Pearson
text: If I could rate this vet lower than one star I would.  I just had a horrible experience with Dr. Pittman. After several days agonizing over my beloved pet, we had to make the decision to have him put to sleep.  This was done at Limestone Vet.  The arrangements were that afterwards they would call the local pet cremation facility to have my dog picked up for cremation.  After two days I called to make sure everything went as expected.  I soon learned that my precious doggy was not picked up and cremated, but actually thrown in the trash bin & picked up by the county & dumped at the local landfill.  I can't get the image of my precious Buddy in the landfill out of my head,  it's been horrible.  I've never encountered a more uncaring vet than Dr. Pittman when I confronted him about this. He basically told me I could leave his office & if I wrote a review, I'd better make sure every word was true or I could be in trouble. So I can assure you that this is all true.

name: Steven DeBoer
text: Only speaking for Dr. Pittman and not the other vets at this location. He had an awful attitude and was probably the most rude vet my wife and I have ever been involved with. A dog we adopted had a procedure on his eyelids prior to us adopting him.  The shelter had paid for the corrective surgery. About 1 month after we had him his eyes were still bothering him so we brought him back to see Dr. Pittman and he said we would have to pay for surgery because he had gained 10lbs (big Rottweiler) and that's why his eyes bothered him again. Even though the issue was never corrected and his eyes never stopped bothering him, he tried to pin the blame on us.  Overall just rude. Thankful that he is not our local vet and we never have to go back.

name: Evan Waugh
text: There are two docs there. I cannot remember their names, but one is female and the other is male. The female is awesome. The male has a horrible attitude and his patient care is severely lacking. I'm currently trying to decide whether to report him to the state. If it weren't for her we would find somewhere else.

name: Vani Way
text: Dr. Pitman is a good Vet and staff are friendly.

name: Tonya Williams
text: They took great care of our cat patches

name: Jean-Luc Burhop (Lambda Scientist)
text: Great vet. Always helpful and good to my dogs.

name: Holly Burch
text: I wouldn't even give him one star but I had to to write a review. Dr. Pitman has the worst attitude I've ever seen in a vet (and I work in rescue and have dealt with many). If you have a Pitbull don't even think about taking it there. He thinks they are all dangerous and not a single one could be a good dog. He does not care about the animals he works with or the animals at the shelter. I'm so thankful we switched vets and never have to go back. I would never recommend him to anyone.

name: Jennifer Wells
text:
My Spouse and I were traveling through because my spouse drives a big rig. We have a little kitty named Honey and she had been getting sicker for about a week and a half. We became extremely worried for her because she was not getting any better. She has had respiratory problems in the past but this time it was much more severe.
We called and the receptionist lady was so nice and said we could bring her in and was very understanding of our situation.
Once we got there we were amazed by the knowledge the staff has and the doctor, Dr. Pitman was so observant, caring, personal, and very gifted in his expertise.

We were scared our Honey was seriously sick. He took x-rays and personally wanted to show us what they looked like and showed them to us explaining to us what was going on in each part of the x-rays. To make a long story short, he explained what was going on and stopped our tears with comforting explanations telling us what he would do and that things would be fine with extra care and the medicine he would be giving her.
For us just to be traveling through, this is the most wonderful Vet Doctor we have ever encountered and he really cares about pets and takes each and every visit obviously very seriously whether you are a regular client or just passing through.

After he explained the x-rays, he came in and explained thoroughly to us of how we would need to give her the medication and he practiced the steps with us of how to hold her head while giving her the pill and water. His lady staff helper was so helpful as well and they were both very hands on with us in showing us how to give the medication without any problems.
We sure wish we could take this Vet Doctor and his staff home with us, this was a truly genuine caring team of staff and the Doctor was absolutely wonderful and caring and the most knowledgeable we have ever encountered in a Vet Clinic EVER!

We would recommend anyone who loves their pets and who is traveling to stop at this clinic if you are having any problems with any of your little furry babies.

If we could give this Vet Clinic a 10 Star rating, we certainly would and if more Vets and Clinics were like this one with such an amazing team and Doctor, Dr. Pitman, the world would be in excellent shape when it comes to sick pets who need that extra attention and loving to successfully heal.
If you want to get to the bottom of what is going on with your furry babies, this is the Vet to go to.
The Doctor even told us, since my spouse travels through here on his trips often that if we are back through here in a couple of weeks to stop in and see him that he would like to see how she is doing and how her respiratory infection is doing and improving.
Keep up the great work you all are doing here with your wonderful friendly atmosphere and loving care for all.
If you have written a bad review on this Clinic, there is something seriously wrong with you. This Doctor and Staff helped calm us down from being so upset and the staff lady brought us tissues because she was so observant and seen us crying and upset worried about our little baby Honey. This staff and Doctor has the most wonderful personalities and down to earth friendly attitudes of anyone we have met, and today, it's not easy finding that anywhere.
Just an excellent experience and now we are back on the road with less worry and no tears. What a blessing it was for us to happen to get lucky enough to be here at just the right time and to find such a wonderful Vet and Staff!
If you are traveling and need to get your baby in to see a Vet, you could not go wrong here. The exit you want to get off on is 351 off of interstate 65.

Thank you Dr. Pitman and staff for making sure our baby Honey will be okay now and doing such a great job at helping us take the right steps to get her health back on the road to success. You are all Angels in our book!

Patrick and Jennifer

Our visit was on 11-10-2014.

name: Baylee Shields
text: Great Service for the community

name: Tricia Banks
text: We had fun working there.

name: John Price
text: They do a great job.

name: M Davis
text: Recently pulled a dog from the pound that was spayed by this "vet" - her nipple was nearly shaved off (had to be stiched back in place) and neither the techs nor the staff said anything about this. We discovered the stitch and the injury when we got home. Appalling. Also, the 'boarding facility' for this vet is space shared with the pound - please check this out before you let your dog stay there. It's ancient, disgusting, dank, and disease-ridden. This is a "vet" who has spoken publicly about his biases towards pit-bull type breeds, so if you have a bully mix don't ever bring them here! This is also a "vet" who ran SNAP out of Limestone County because it would have affected his profit margin (so he thinks). It's public record that this man owns 3 houses in Limestone County alone - a low-cost spay and neuter clinic in this county would have done nothing but benefit those who need the help and reduce the number of unwanted animals coming in to his pound (yes, he runs the dog pound as well). In short, if you care about your pets, don't bring them to this man who has earned the nickname Dr. Death amongst the community.

name: Julie Keith
text: They have treated both my pets. Friendly staff, variety of services. Prices are a little high.

name: Mark Berry
text: Great service, great people

name: chassity Pylant
text: Friendly staff fast service

name: Kathleen Vazquez-butterflyshadow
text: Went to the animal shelter, which is apparently run/staffed by the vets office, not a real pleasant experience.

name: Kourtney Wesley
text: Loving and caring staff

name: Jessie Lovell
text: Great service i.

name: Edward Troupe
text: Took brother and his 3 dogs to the doctor

name: Sandy Colvin
text: Friendly caring and attentive

name: Wendi Fulton

name: Jennifer Hawkins
text: Very clean and friendly

name: Bailey Benton
text: Nice people

name: Eric Clem
text: Good services

name: Joshua Schaffer
text: Great people

name: PixieBaby
text: Very friendly...

name: Shelly Gutierrez
text: The staff is caring.  Prices are reasonable and Dr Trapp is great with animals.  I have took my fur babies for years.

name: Logan Cain
text: A great animal hospital with courteous staff.

name: Josh B.
text:
Really nice and got me an appointment fast to spay my cat phobos
Great place!

name: Lyãna Lee
text: Spent money on flea medicine that the Dr recommended for it not to even work my poor baby is still scratching like crazy

name: William Smith
text: Wonderful people and fair prices, definitely recommend taking your pets to them

name: Teresa Curtis
text: They are very friendly and take great care of our fur babies. We had to have our 16 yr old cat put to sleep and they were awesome in the way they handled our situation. We have been going there for over 30 years and wouldn't go anywhere else!!

name: Annette Young
text: She's great! Always nice and answers all your questions.

name: Nessa Xylie
text: This is a great vet office with a wonderful team ready to help our furry family members. We have taken our pets here for years. Thanks so much for your love and support.

name: Shala
text: I’m A New Cat Mama and My Cat Nacho was Recently Groomed by Dr. Trapp. I am pleased with the outcome and the expert Grooming.

name: Jeanne Kerstiens
text: Patient, caring, excellent.

name: Jennifer Thomas
text: Dr. Trapp is so nice to deal with. Great with pets!! The only minor inconvenience is that they only accept check and cash.

name: Renea Solomon
text: Dr. Trapp & her whole staff are absolutely wonderful. They’ve taken care of our entire family’s fur babies since I was in high school & now I’ve got my own sophomore! If you want a vet office that cares for your babies as if they were their own, you won’t find a better place!

name: ann “hall” brown
text: Love Dr. Trapp and her staff

name: Sandra Godsey
text: Dr Trapp is the very best ❤️ both if my dogs love her and the office. No fear or hesitation. Love the holistic approach HIGHLY RECOMMEND

name: Lyndall H.
text: Dr. Trap genuinely loves animals. She does not treat them as an avenue to become wealthy. I was surprised to read others complaining about the prices. I do not think you will find less expensive care in Marshall County. I adopted a mixed breed/funny looking dog from her office. She always asks me about him, if I see her without him. When she was treating another dog of mine, she got in the floor with her and checked her out and gave her medicine. That made my dog much more comfortable. She is much improved one day later. Our family has used this animal clinic for 20 plus years. The staff is wonderful too! Courteous and professional!

name: Allie Stanton
text: They helped my sweet willow, made her feel at home, and made sure she was well taken care of, we had thought she drank anti freeze, turned out she had something else, they gave her medicine and she's doing so much better, we also got the seresto flea and tick collar for her and her hair has grown back within a week. We were so blessed to find a permanent vet for her!! Highly satisfied and I definetly recommend them to take care of your fur babys❤️😅😍🥰🐾🦴🐶

name: Acts 2:38 Evangelism Ministries
text: Great customer service. Service price is a little too high, specially if you just lost you pet. The sign off price is way too much

name: Susan Bowen
text: Great staff and great vet. Highly recommend.

name: Carol Weeks
text: Dr. Trapp is the nicest, most compassionate vet I have ever known. She has cared for my family's pets for over 20 years.

name: Diane Feltner
text: Very friendly staff .  Dog was beautiful

name: Nekuromu
text: Very kind, and helpful. I've taken multiple pets here, some a few more times than others and have always had a positive experience.

name: pam lubanski

name: Cheryl Smith
text: Treated my dog like they would there own
